Description:
As-new designer home features premium inclusions throughout
AVAILABLE TO INSPECT FROM 14TH MARCH ONWARD
No expense has been spared on this former display home that has never been lived in and is presented in immaculate as-new condition. It features on-trend designer interiors and premium inclusions throughout and offers stylish low-maintenance living with plenty of space for your growing family. You'll also love this peaceful holiday location that's close to schools and shops, three minutes to Clifton Springs boat ramp for easy access to Port Phillip Bay, and just 20 minutes to all major amenities in Geelong CBD.
-- Tiled open-plan family/meals area, plus separate carpeted living area plus study
-- High-end gas kitchen with waterfall-edge stone bench tops and a walk-in pantry
-- Stunning master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite opening to a private courtyard
-- Built-in robes to three generous extra bedrooms; designer family-sized main bathroom
-- Elegant alfresco entertaining with fireplace, built-in barbeque and gravel fire pit
-- Lush easy-care gardens create plenty of privacy without the maintenance hassles
-- Internal laundry with outdoor access; double garage/workshop with third toilet/wet room
The fenced front yard with an ultra-modern covered porch creates an impressive entry into this five-star designer home.
The stylish master bedroom is located off the entry hall at front and features a bright outlook through a stunning frameless corner window plus elegant wall paneling and a luxurious ensuite with twin vanity.
Continue into the carpeted living room with striking ceiling recess and adjoining study space, and through to the open-plan family/meals area with premium chef's kitchen.
The family/meals area flows onto two separate patios connected by a gravel fire pit with built-in timber bench seating for seamless alfresco entertaining, and the three good-sized bedrooms join the main bathroom and internal laundry in a separate wing of the home at rear.

Description:
Titled Level Block on the Bellarine
Day dreaming of a connection to the shimmering bayside waters of Corio Bay and the beautiful rural landscape of the Bellarine Peninsula then look no further.
Titled and waiting for construction to start. Level block located in the prestigious Bay Water Estate Curlewis. Surrounded by quality new homes. Wander down the landscaped, creekside pathway to the sheltered beach or walk with the children to the local day care centre or primary school. Public transport is at your doorstep with several quality secondary schools nearby. The Curlewis shopping centre is located in close proximity offering a variety of shops.
Only 10 minutes to the Port Phillip Ferry at Portarlington and many local wineries. The Clifton Springs boat ramp is located close by. Hurry to enquire on this sought after position. Lots selling quickly. 504m2

Description:
Waterfront lifestyle - live the dream
Overlooking the beautiful Port Phillip bay with a view that cannot be built out and just 100m from the parks and reserves along the shoreline, this newly built and smartly designed family home with modern features offers all the comforts you need with loads of hidden extras and the space you desire.
The location is unparalleled with no other new estate across the Bellarine and surf coast offering shoreline living, AND with an unmatched affordability in water-fronted property in the region, this is one of the most accessible sea change locations in Victoria.
Curlewis also offers a short trip to a number of the peninsulas best attractions, including a number of quality golf courses, award winning wineries, historical sites and townships, numerous amazing beaches, regular markets, annual events AND Queenscliff where you can jump on the ferry and enjoy a day trip on the Mornington peninsula or Portarlington offering a ferry to the docklands in Melbourne.
Upon entry, you'll find a versatile room which would lend itself to a home office, guest bedroom or formal sitting room to enjoy the view and also the first of three living areas, both fitted with down lights and quality carpet. Moving through into the heart of the home delivers you into the main activity centre with open plan living, dining and kitchen area complimented by an under roof alfresco creating that ultimate indoor/outdoor entertainment space surrounded by a well-designed low maintenance rear yard with raised grass area great for the kids to play and edged with garden beds.
The family chef will love the Kitchen which provides full views of the main activity centre and boasts all the modern conveniences you would expect in a premium home with stone benchtops, 900mm stove/oven, soft touch sliders, built in microwave, dishwasher as well as the ultimate butlers pantry with an extra sink and loads of cupboard/bench space. The butlers pantry also opens direct into the garage for added convenience when bringing in the weekly groceries.
A powder room, walk in linen/storage, additional storage under stairs and large separate laundry complete the ground floor.
Moving up the wide carpeted stairway with timber balustrade we enter the second floor.
Four generous bedrooms are serviced by a large central bathroom whilst the massive master bedroom overlooks the incredible views to the North and offers his and hers walk in robes and ensuite complete with oversized shower, recessed shelving, double vanity and toilet.
Arguable the best room in the house, the 3rd living area takes in the best of the views and opens direct onto the balcony, a perfect place to sit and watch the ships passing through.
The climate is controlled year round by gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
Save yourself the time and energy of building and simply step straight into this ultimate family home just a stones throw from the beaches of Curlewis which are the best kept secret of the Bellarine.
Call Dion today to learn more and book an inspection today.

Description:
Its Home At First Sight
Just 4 years young in the very popular suburb of Curlewis this Sherridon home will tick a lot of your boxes! Fantastic floor plan as you step inside to the first living area which is carpeted, light filled & has street views. Floating floor boards lead you down the hall. Master bedroom which has walk through robes to the very spacious ensuite featuring his & hers basins plus a double shower & a sliding door for privacy. Generous open plan kitchen, dining & 2nd living area which has yard views plus sliding doors out to the deck. Kitchen features stone benches, stainless steel appliances including a 900mm oven, 6 burner gas cook top, dishwasher & a walk in pantry. Bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 all have built in robes. Bathroom has a deep luxurious bath, seperate shower & single vanity basin. Outside you have an undercover deck, a fenced spa area & side gates. Internal access from the double lock up garage. Additional features are gas ducted heating, reverse cycle split system & an alarm system on a great 501m2 allotment. Just a 500 meter walk to Curlewis shopping centre which has Safeway, cafes, variety shops, doctors & a 24 hour chemist. Plus everything the Bellarine has to offer with boat ramps, the bay, beaches, wineries, cafes, walking tracks & the ferry service are all just a short drive away, your new lifestyle needs have been met.

STYLISH ! FABULOUS DESIGN ! QUALITY WITH GENEROUS PROPORTIONS.
No. 11 has the best of everything from the inside to undercover outdoor entertaining area with enclosed pool, all boasting natural light and easy flow floorplan. Wide double door entrance to the open plan kitchen , adjacent dining and living space, separate theatre room and another flexible living/play area used for the children . Four bedrooms, the master is at the front with large full ensuite and WIR, remaining three ( 2 with WIR , other BIR ) are located at the rear close to third living room allowing for defined areas for easy living, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include central heating, split system, big walk in pantry, stone benches, glass splashback, great flooring and carpets as well as quality window furnishings. Double garage with internal access. Leisure walks to jetty, school and shopping centre......it is a dream home and position to enjoy the best of the Bellarine Penisula. Take the stress out of building , inspect now.

Description:
New home with room for the boat and caravan
Located in the heart of the newest estate of Curlewis a minutes walk from the shops and with the beach down the road, this property was built for the growing family, retiree or holiday maker.
Curlewis also offers a short trip to a number of the peninsulas best attractions, including a number of quality golf courses, award winning wineries, historical sites, great beaches, regular markets, annual events AND Queenscliff where you can jump on the ferry and enjoy a day trip on the Mornington peninsula or Portarlington offering a ferry to the docklands in Melbourne.
With an intelligent design that encompasses open spaces, natural light, zoned living and more, this brand new home will leave you wanting for nothing.
Set on a substantial allotment of 590m2 that offers additional side access for storage of the caravan, boat or extra cars, the property has all the space for the toys you deserve.
Upon entry you will be met by the well designed lay out that begins with a master bedroom at the front of the residence with a carpeted living area adjacent creating an independent living zone just for the parents.
Continuing through we are met by the light filled open plan heart of the property. The kitchen is fully equipped with stone top island bench, stainless appliances, dishwasher, walk in pantry and breakfast bar. The living area opens through sliding doors onto the undercover alfresco that looks out over the newly created landscapes.
Accessed via the separate hall, 3 generous bedrooms with built in robes, a central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry complete the internal spaces.
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling control the climate year round.
The double garage has remote roller door, rear and internal access, whilst the side access provides additional parking (as previously mentioned) and is gated for security.
There is simply nothing to do but move in & start enjoying this fantastic home.
Call Dion today for your opportunity to learn more and book an inspection.

Close to shopping, schools and all that the Bellarine Peninsula offers whilst only a short drive to central Geelong and an easy commute to Melbourne. Description:
AWESOME LIFESTYLE, ENVIABLE VIEWS
This home will compliment the lifestyle you crave for, a location that is fast becoming one of the most sought after addresses on the Bellarine and above all a beautiful home to relax in and enjoy. Inspection on this property is a must. From the moment you stroll up to this designer home you will be awe struck by the way it commands presence on this idyllic location, set high above the landscape, the smashed granite entrance conveys strength and beauty, but stepping inside this property you come to realise you have entered something special. With a wide entrance hall, four bedrooms, one with full en-suite and the others complimented by an outstanding modern bathroom and living area all downstairs, the space and openness of this home starts to come to the fore. Moving upstairs via the solid timber staircase you enter a world of open plan living, spacious entertaining, well-appointed kitchen and hidden butlers pantry, fully equipped with all the trimmings you would expect in a home of this grandeur. Two separate living areas, one with 4 metre high ceilings, dining and theater room compliment the top level space along with three balcony areas spanning almost any direction allowing you outdoor living no matter what the weather conditions. The views from all balconies are nothing short of spectacular, spanning from Melbourne across to the You Yang's and around to Geelong, with active views on the waters of Port Phillip Bay. This property abounds with creature comforts - split systems, a featured gas stone fire and out door spa. This is a home that embraces all the Bellarine has to offer being just minutes from wineries, golf clubs, bay walks, fishing spots and all approximately a 15 minute drive to Geelong.

Description:
STYLISH COASTAL LIVING
Located only a few hundred metres from the bay and walking tracks is this beautifully designed property on a neat & tidy 481m2 approx parcel of land. This fabulous home offers not only lifestyle but absolute comfort and coastal appeal with stylish finishes and a spacious layout. The sun filled spacious living area with study nook allows for private retreat from the open plan kitchen and dining area making it the perfect place to escape, unwind and relax with a true sense of serenity and flows out seamlessly through sliding doors to the rear garden. The modern kitchen design features quality fixtures, stainless steel appliances and a fabulously concealed large walk in pantry whilst the spacious master suite enjoys WWC, architectural windows with plantation shutters and a large WIR plus ensuite. Two further bedrooms are generously proportioned and include BIR and WWC. The home maintains year round comfort with gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling and quality laminate timber flooring. Outside enjoys a delightful landscaped garden with side gate access to the outdoor shower perfectly positioned to rinse off after a day at the beach! The remote double lock up garage with internal access also offers additional roller door for access to the rear of the property with storage space for a small boat or trailer. This truly is a beautiful home well suited for weekend getaways from the city or alternatively easy low maintenance living for the owner occupier. Call today for an inspection!

Description:
Peace and Tranquillity Living Awaits One Lucky Purchaser!!
With permanent north facing views of the You Yangs and surrounding bay areas from your own rear balcony, this quality built family home is sure to suit a range of buyers.
Featuring four oversized bedrooms plus study, three bathrooms with additional powder room and finished with multiple living zones. This home would not be complete without the upstairs alfresco area, accessible from both living and the master bedroom. Furthermore a front balcony/terrace can be accessed from a separate bedroom.
Quality upgrades are a defining point throughout the home, including a large walk in pantry, his and hers walk in robe, oversized garage, an abundance of solar panels, complimented by low maintenance, fully landscaped yards and an alfresco overlooking the heated in ground pool.
Location is also a highlight feature of this quality home, built within Curlewis’ premium Baywater Estate, positioned a stone’s throw from a sandy shore and still within walking distance to Curlewis’ newest shopping complex.
Local schools and other daily essentials are also not far from your door step.
Premium properties such as this are a rarity in today’s market, so book an inspection or attend one of our upcoming open days and experience everything this amazing family size home has on offer!!

Description:
Parkside Position
If you are looking for a lifestyle change that is more relaxed then this modern home in the beautiful Curlewis Estate is for you. Located across from the beautifully landscaped Percy Baxter Park with pathways leading to the serene creekside walk that meanders to the beachfront.
Stroll to the local shops, the ultra modern day care centre or the Clifton Springs primary school. No need to get the car out of the garage.
This modern Burbank home is constructed with generous open-plan living and dining areas to accommodate the growing family. The spacious, light-filled master suite takes pride of place at the entry to the home and looks across to the rolling lawns of the park. The family - living areas are open plan including a kitchen with good cupboard space, walk in pantry with access to the laundry, 900mm free-standing SS cooker, SSDW, stone bench tops and double glazing throughout.
Three minor bedrooms all with BIRs are sited at the rear of the home adjacent to the family bathroom.
The family-living area connects seamlessly to the outdoor entertaining area and low maintenance rear yard. The corner position also gives the option of side access to the rear yard. Currently tenanted by a great family at $360 per week until Feb 19.
Do not miss an opportunity to inspect this great home !

Description:
Start your exciting new lifestyle in Curlewis!
Valuable titled block in the highly sought after Baywater Estate, 499m2. Come and live the Curlewis lifestyle in this enjoyable community by building your family home or investment on this vacant block.
-Moments away from Bayview Central, adventure playgrounds & open park
-Located on the Bellarine Peninsula just 17kms from Geelong CBD
-Clifton Springs Primary School just around the corner
-Within close proximity to Portarlington including the Ferry Service
-Clifton Springs marina is a short distance down the road
-Bayview Bellarine Estate is the only waterfront residential land for sale on the Bellarine Peninsula
-Magnificent bay views in a peaceful rural setting
-A short walk to the beach and the boat harbour
-Convenient access to a broad range of shops, schools and leisure facilities
-The Bellarine is such a popular visitor destination
If you are looking to build and live within the Baywater Estate then this block is just for you! It won't last long so contact us today!

Description:
Treat Yourself To This
Just 2 years old this spacious Geelong Home will definitely impress you. Step inside to a large lounge with street views. Plenty of storage throughout starting with 3 built in linen/broom cupboards. Down the hall are the big bedrooms 2 & 3 that both have 3 built in robes, roman style blinds & ceiling fans. Central bathroom has a deep luxurious bath, separate shower & single vanity basin. Super large master bedroom has sliding doors to the backyard, walk in robe & full en-suite with oversized shower. Open plan living is tiled & light filled offering plenty of room for 2nd lounge & dining area with yard views and sliding doors to the undercover alfresco. Kitchen is styled by stone bench tops, pendant lights over bench, stainless steel 900mm gas 5 burner cook top, oven & range hood and a great walk-in pantry. Internal access from the double lock up garage. Landscaped gardens out the back with plenty of room for kids and pets alike to run free plus a garden shed & pebbled area on a great block size of 550m2. Additional features include colour bond fences, down lights throughout, gas ducted heating, reverse cycle split system and blue tooth speakers in the roof. Just a 100 meter walk to the Curlewis shopping centre with Woolworths, cafes, variety shops & a 24 hour chemist. Not to mention the bay, boat ramp and cliff top walks just down the road, plus everything else the Bellarine has to offer such as award winning wineries & ferry services.

Description:
Bay End Titled Block
Dreaming of a connection to the shimmering bayside waters of Corio Bay and the beautiful rural landscape of the Bellarine Peninsula then look no further.
Number 141 Oceania Drive is just waiting for its new owner to build their dream home. Already titled and ready to go this slightly elevated block sits close to the bay end of the prestigious Bay Water Estate. Wander down the landscaped, creekside pathway to the sheltered beach or walk the children to the local day care centre or primary school. Public transport at your doorstep with several quality secondary schools nearby. The Curlewis shopping centre is located in close proximity with more expansive shopping facilities nearby in Drysdale.
Only 10 minutes to the Port Phillip Ferry at Portarlington and local wineries. Lots selling quickly.

Description:
Convenient Living In Curlewis!!
Positioned directly across from Curlewis shopping centre, this property presents the perfect lifestyle or investment opportunity. This sun-bathed single-level home offers low-maintenance living in a convenient location.
Configured with three well-proportioned carpeted bedrooms, the master bedroom features full ensuite and walk in robes, while the remaining two bedrooms have BIRs and share the main bathroom. A light and bright kitchen with island bench, gas cooktop and dishwasher overlook the open-plan dining and living area.
Central heating throughout the home and split system cooling in the living area provide comfort all year round. Secure parking is present with a double lock-up garage.
Currently tenanted on a fixed term lease until August 2019.
With all amenities at your fingertips, this property is sure to be highly sought after. Be sure to contact Tim or Kylie to arrange an inspection.

Description:
First Impressions Count
Stunning & sure to impress, this 3 bedroom Metricon home is a mere 3 years old in the popular Curlewis Parks Estate. Spirit oak nature floorboards throughout. Master bedroom has plantation shutters, pendant lights, walk through robe & full en-suite. Bedrooms 2 & 3 both have built in robes. Central bathroom has a single vanity basin, separate shower & deep luxurious bath. Open plan living is large & light filled. Kitchen has stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including a 900mm electric oven, gas 5 burner cook top and dishwasher. Lounge has yard views and dining with sliding doors to an awesome undercover deck. There's still plenty of yard with landscaped rows of lilly pillies and large planter boxes. Double lock up garage has internal access. Additional features are evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating & new led downlights on a 399m2 block. There are parklands across the road, with a short drive to local schools, supermarkets, cafes, 24 hour chemist & doctors clinic. Also at your doorstep is everything the Bellarine lifestyle has to offer, including the boat ramp, cliff top bay walks, award winning wineries & ferry services.

Description:
SPACIOUS MODERN APPEAL
Ideally located in a family friendly location this near new home, just 15 months old, offers low maintenance living. There is simply nothing to do here other than make this home your own. The light filled interior showcases all you could desire in family living. The open plan living, dining and kitchen area makes entertaining a breeze. A second separate living area offers further flexibility and a great place to unwind and just relax.
Compromising of 4 spacious bedrooms each with overhead ceiling fans, the spacious main bedroom being located at the front of the house boasts a walk-in-robe and ensuite. The second living area and 3 bedrooms with built in robes, a contemporary main bathroom with separate toilet are located towards the rear of the house. The kitchen is fully equipped and includes stone bench tops, 900mm Technica free standing oven and Bellisima dishwasher. Situated on a 448m2 (approx.) allotment, this home offers a low maintenance rear garden, internal access from the garage, ducted heating throughout, a split system air conditioning in open plan living / dining area and solar panels.
If youâ??re looking for a low maintenance lifestyle, the ideal living opportunity is here. This property is perfect for an investor, first home buyer or owner occupier. Curlewis is located in the centre of the Bellarine Peninsula with easy access to all the wineries and eateries. If you are seeking an outstanding and attractive property in a safe and quiet location, walking distance to the Shopping Centre and five minutes to the vibrant Drysdale Village, this fine home presents an opportunity not to be missed.

Description:
Rural Getaway on The Bellarine
At the end of the tree lined drive, past a small planting of pinot noir vines sits a light filled, mid-century modern style, well proportioned, 3 bedroom family home. Beautifully situated on 1.2ha, with views onto neighbouring vineyards, this residence offers generous family living with zoned spaces together with an enviable garden and entertaining area overlooking the pool.
The first of 2 living spaces has a stunning wood fire and large windows with views to the garden. Timber beamed ceilings and slate flooring in the entrance and throughout the home adds texture and durability and there is plenty of storage on offer here. The well laid out kitchen has plenty of room to move and a large bench that overlooks the adjoining dining area. There is a laundry with handy access to outside and family bathroom with shower and toilet converts to a powder room for guests.
The second family room is a flexible space that leads to the courtyard and pool. There’s an extra room with folding doors here that could be an ideal study, home office, playroom or guest accommodation. Two bedrooms, both with BIRs and garden views are located at the same end of the house to complete a family wing. The master suite is at the front of the home, away from the noise of the kids and guests! Complete with an ensuite and WIR, this bedroom has a lovely view onto the vineyard and is a peaceful retreat.
Across 1.2ha, this property has beautiful gardens, large sheds and a fabulous entertaining area focused around a pool and spa. The pool house, located off the bricked courtyard is a great space for summer dining and catching some relief from the hot summer sun. Nearby, the grassed area in front of the vineyard offers a great place for kids play and the potential for extending the planting.
A fantastic rural location that is close to beaches, shops and golf clubs, this property is an incredible opportunity to realise your rural Bellarine dream.
Insights: 61-69 Navarre Road, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.
